subject: testing private methods
msgSnippet: please kindly let me know how to test a private method in a class using junit.I  use netbeans as my development environment to which Junit is integrated, Once
messageBody:
please kindly let me know how to test a private method in a class
using junit.I use netbeans as my development environment to which
Junit is integrated, Once i create the test package for concrete
classes all test skeltons of public methods appear in junit test class
but not the private methods
thanx
